product_name: Chaco Z/2 Unaweep Sandals - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Contoured footbeds support your feet in the sporty Chaco Z/2 Unaweep sandals for men. Sturdy adjustable straps wrap around toes for a secure fit. Infinitely adjustable polyester strap system uses a pull-through design to give you a secure fit while avoiding the bulk of extra buckles and straps. Topsoles are anatomically contoured with molded arches for all-day support; sculpted heel risers add stability. Molded polyurethane topsole/midsoles offer durable, dependable cushioning. Non-marking Vibram(R) rubber outsoles feature deep lug design for traction, plus they clean themselves as you walk. Closeout.
short_description: Contoured footbeds support your feet in the sporty Chaco Z/2 Unaweep sandals for men. Sturdy adjustable straps wrap around toes for a secure fit.
